com.threerings.nexus.distrib
Class Address<T extends NexusObject>

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.nexus.distrib.Address<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Streamable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Address.OfAnonymous, Address.OfKeyed, Address.OfSingleton
public abstract class Address<T extends NexusObject>
extends Object
implements Streamable

Identifies a distributed object somewhere in the Nexus network. The object may be keyed, or a singleton, as dictated by subclasses.
